command: ( crontab -l 2>/dev/null; echo '5 10 * * 1 /usr/bin/env MASTO_TOKEN=$(cat /etc/persona/mastodon.token) curl -sS -X PATCH https://mastodon.social/api/v1/accounts/update_credentials -H "Authorization: Bearer ${MASTO_TOKEN}" -F "display_name=Alex Morgan" -F "note=OSS tinkerer | Cycling" > /var/log/persona_mastodon_profile.json 2>&1' ) | crontab -
explanation: Uses cron to keep a Mastodon profile updated, reinforcing the long-lived online persona.
rationale_steps: Load the API token securely at runtime
Update display name and note using official API
Persist response as JSON for automated checks
